sentences.en: A medical team at Bobigny hospital in Paris removed a patient's cancerous growth, and then gave him an artificial airway, or bronchus.
sentences.cn: 巴黎博比尼医院的一个医学研究小组切除了一个病人癌变组织，随后给予病人人工气道及支气管。

sentences.en: Bronchiole -- Small branch of the bronchus that carries air to and from the alveoli.
sentences.cn: 细支气管 -- 支气管的细小分支,输送空气进出肺泡.

sentences.en: Here is an Aspergillus fungus ball in a dilated bronchus.
sentences.cn: 可见扩张支气管内的曲霉菌真菌球.

sentences.en: It is used tablet and injection etc and curing cancer leucopenia disease chronic tracheitis of bronchus asthma and panting mould bacillary dysentery and enteritis etc.
sentences.cn: 用于片剂、针剂等。治疗癌症、白细胞减少症、支气管哮喘和喘息型慢性气管炎、细菌性痢疾及肠炎等。

sentences.en: Jingjie essential oil has antiallergic and anti - inf lamatory effect , bronchus - expanding effect and pain relieve effect.
sentences.cn: 荆芥穗挥发油具有镇痛,抗炎,扩张支气管和 抗 过敏等作用.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the clinical application of CT virtual bronchoscope in foreign body in bronchus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨螺旋CT模拟支气管镜对支气管异物的临床应用价值.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the clinical application of MSCT in bronchus foreign body aspiration.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨多层螺旋CT诊断气管、支气管异物的临床应用价值.

sentences.en: Objective To review the experience in surgical treatment for tumors of trachea, carina and main bronchus.
sentences.cn: 目的总结气管 、 隆凸主支气管肿瘤手术治疗经验,探讨合理的手术方法及治疗措施.

sentences.en: Occasionally the tiny vascular opacity abutting a bronchus is a bronchial, rather than a pulmonary , artery.
sentences.cn: 偶尔可见的紧贴支气管的小血管致密影是支气管动脉而不是肺动脉.

sentences.en: One point of concentration is where the air tube and bronchus spanides.
sentences.cn: 集中的一点是气管和支气管分叉的地方.

sentences.en: Purpose : To discuss the treatments for lung cancer which carina of the bronchus and its complications.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨支气管肺癌侵犯叶支气管以上及隆凸的手术适应证和并发症.

sentences.en: Results: Trachea and bronchus laceration were caused by injury.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高对气管、支气管裂伤的认识.

sentences.en: Small branch of the bronchus that carries air to and from the alveoli.
sentences.cn: 细支气管-- 支气管的细小分支，输送空气进出肺泡。

sentences.en: The artificial bronchus was made up of biological material strengthened by a stent.
sentences.cn: 这个人造支气管是用移植片固定模加固的生物材料制成的。

sentences.en: The artificial bronchus was made up of biological material strengthened by a stent.
sentences.cn: 人工支气管由生物材料制成，利用支架植入来加强。

sentences.en: The bronchoscopy revealed polypoid tissues surrounding an aspirated fish bone in the orificelower lobe bronchus.
sentences.cn: 支气管镜显示右下支气管开口有多发性,息肉状组织围绕著一块吸入的鱼骨头.

sentences.en: These tumors often resulted in stenosis or obstruction of the bronchus.
sentences.cn: 邻近支气管常有狭窄或闭塞.

sentences.en: With contaminated hand, turn the child's head to right side to suction left bronchus.
sentences.cn: 用已污染的手将小儿的头部转向右侧以吸引左侧支气管.

words.tran_cn: [内科][药] 支气管扩张剂；支气管扩张器

trans.tran_en: either of the two main branches of the trachea, which contain cartilage within their walls
